name: Replica Mural: Lone Peak in a Sea of Fog
description: A replica made of a certain mural that depicts a mountain within an ocean of fog. This picture seems to hide some indecipherable meaning.\nIt is said the ancient natives of Tsurumi Island would use paints to depict ancient, now-unremembered history onto the rock walls of caves, and that these murals have remained pristine to this day. One might be able to learn more about an unknown past through this mural...
